thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Microsoft Reports Qtrly Diluted Earnings Per Share $0.95

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Microsoft Reports Qtrly Diluted Earnings Per Share $0.95
text:
April 27 (Reuters) - Microsoft Corp:
* MICROSOFT - QTRLY DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE WAS $0.95 AND INCREASED 36%
* MICROSOFT - QTRLY REVENUE WAS $26.8 BILLION AND INCREASED 16%
* MICROSOFT - QTRLY REVENUE IN PRODUCTIVITY AND BUSINESS PROCESSES WAS $9.0 BILLION AND INCREASED 17%
* MICROSOFT - QTRLY REVENUE IN INTELLIGENT CLOUD WAS $7.9 BILLION AND INCREASED 17%
* MICROSOFT - QTRLY REVENUE IN MORE PERSONAL COMPUTING WAS $9.9 BILLION AND INCREASED 13% (UP 11% IN CONSTANT CURRENCY)
* MICROSOFT - QTRLY SERVER PRODUCTS AND CLOUD SERVICES REVENUE INCREASED 20%
* MICROSOFT - QTRLY OFFICE COMMERCIAL PRODUCTS AND CLOUD SERVICES REVENUE INCREASED 14%
* MICROSOFT - QTRLY WINDOWS OEM REVENUE INCREASED 4% (UP 4% IN CONSTANT CURRENCY) DRIVEN BY OEM PRO REVENUE GROWTH OF 11%
* MICROSOFT - Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.85, REVENUE VIEW $25.77 BILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* MICROSOFT - QTRLY SURFACE REVENUE INCREASED 32% (UP 27% IN CONSTANT CURRENCY)
* MICROSOFT- QTRLY SEARCH ADVERTISING REVENUE EXCLUDING TRAFFIC ACQUISITION COSTS INCREASED 16% (UP 14% IN CONSTANT CURRENCY)
* MICROSOFT - QTRLY WINDOWS COMMERCIAL PRODUCTS AND CLOUD SERVICES REVENUE INCREASED 21% (UP 17% IN CONSTANT CURRENCY)
* MICROSOFT - LINKEDIN REVENUE INCREASED 37% IN QUARTER
* MICROSOFT - QTRLY GAMING REVENUE INCREASED 18% (UP 16% IN CONSTANT CURRENCY) DRIVEN BY XBOX SOFTWARE
* MICROSOFT - QTRLY SERVICES REVENUE GROWTH OF 24% (UP 21% IN CONSTANT CURRENCY) MAINLY FROM THIRD PARTY TITLE STRENGTH Source text : [ID: bit.ly/2FhcEmZ ]
